title: Can I do mcom in abroad when I have 45% in ug? - Quora

response.answer_text: It will be hard for you to getting admission but it is possible that you can enroll for M.com. To make sure you get the admission check for the previous merit lists. to get the best you can visit the university website, Find the admission section and you will get all requirements which also includes the minimum marks for the course application. By following this process you will get a list of universities where you can apply. Thank You Edugo Abroad

Yes, you can get admission as there are many colleges and universities which have seats available at somme fee. These are the paid seats. Are you ready to change yourself and study yourself? At Master's program it is more of self study. The course content will be different as it will be based on the rules and regulations of that country.
